email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry: Steel Coils from Shanghai to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Liam,

I hope this message finds you well. We are looking to ship 12,000 MT of steel coils from Shanghai to Rotterdam in April. Could you provide a freight rate and vessel availability for this shipment? We prefer FOB terms.

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Maritime Freight Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Steel Coils from Shanghai to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel MV OCEAN TRADER, with a DWT of 50,000 and LOA of 200m, for your shipment. The laycan is set for April 15-20. Our initial freight rate is USD 45 per MT on FOB terms.

Please let me know if this works for you or if you need further details.

Best regards,
Liam Wilson
Global Cargo Solutions

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Steel Coils from Shanghai to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Liam,

Thank you for the prompt response. Given the volume and our long-term relationship, could you consider lowering the freight rate to USD 42 per MT?

Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Maritime Freight Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Steel Coils from Shanghai to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-term relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD 43 per MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD 10,000 per day.

Please note that the laycan remains April 15-20. I trust this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Liam Wilson
Global Cargo Solutions

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Steel Coils from Shanghai to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Liam,

Thank you for the revised offer. We agree to the USD 43 per MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Maritime Freight Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Steel Coils from Shanghai to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Shanghai on April 15, with a 24-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Liam Wilson
Global Cargo Solutions

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Steel Coils from Shanghai to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Liam,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Maritime Freight Services
